document.full_text: two goals by santi cazorla and one apiece from alvaro negredo and fernando torres led world champions spain to a 4-0 rout of united states in a friendly on saturday.
document.title: cazorla, negredo and torres help spain destroy u.s.
lines_and_colors: two goals by santi cazorla and one apiece from alvaro negredo and fernando torres led world champions spain to a 4-0 rout of united states in a friendly on saturday.
